testcase.classname: User could register to the website
testcase.name: User registers with valid data successfully

testcase.classname: User could login to the website and reset his password
testcase.name: User could log in with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the login page.............................................passed When User enters a valid email and password.................................passed And Clicks on login button..................................................passed Then User should be logged-in successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: User could login to the website and reset his password
testcase.name: User could reset his/her password successfully
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the login page.............................................passed When User clicks on forgot password link....................................passed And Enters the registered email.............................................passed And Clicks on recover button................................................passed Then The password should be reset successfully..............................passed

testcase.classname: User could search the website for a specific product
testcase.name: Logged User could search for any product
testcase.system-out: Given The user is logged in.................................................passed When User enters "laptop" in the search field...............................passed And Clicks on search button.................................................passed Then The related results should contain the "laptop"........................passed

testcase.classname: User could search the website for a specific product
testcase.name: Logged User could search for any product 2
testcase.system-out: Given The user is logged in.................................................passed When User enters "apple" in the search field................................passed And Clicks on search button.................................................passed Then The related results should contain the "apple".........................passed

testcase.classname: User could search the website for a specific product
testcase.name: Logged User could search for any product 3
testcase.system-out: Given The user is logged in.................................................passed When User enters "nike" in the search field.................................passed And Clicks on search button.................................................passed Then The related results should contain the "nike"..........................passed

testcase.classname: User can change the selected currency
testcase.name: Logged User could switch between currencies US-Euro
testcase.system-out: Given The user is logged in.................................................passed Then The products price should appear with the Dollar symbol................passed When User sets the currency to Euro.........................................passed Then The products price should appear with the Euro symbol..................passed

testcase.classname: User can select subcategories of different categories
testcase.name: Logged user could select different Categories
testcase.system-out: Given The user is logged in.................................................passed When User hovers on a random category.......................................passed And Clicks on a random subcategory if found or the category itself if there's no subcategory.passed Then User should be redirected to the selected page correctly...............passed

testcase.classname: User could filter the products with color and with different tags
testcase.name: Logged user could filter with color
testcase.system-out: Given The user is logged in.................................................passed And The user opens the shoes subcategory from the apparel category..........passed When User filters the products by red color.................................passed Then The products should be filtered according to the selected color........passed

testcase.classname: User could filter the products with color and with different tags
testcase.name: Logged user could select different tags
testcase.system-out: Given The user is logged in.................................................passed And The user searches for something.........................................passed When The user selects a tag from the popular tags section...................passed Then The products should be filtered according to the selected tag..........passed

testcase.classname: User can add products to the shopping cart and can manage the added products there
testcase.name: Logged user could add different products to Shopping cart
testcase.system-out: Given The user is logged in.................................................passed And The user searches for something.........................................passed When User adds a product to the cart........................................passed Then The product should be added to the cart successfully...................passed When User adds another product to the cart..................................passed Then The product should be added to the cart successfully...................passed And The cart should contain the added products..............................passed

testcase.classname: User can add products to the wishlist so that he can buy them later
testcase.name: Logged user could add different products to Wishlist
testcase.system-out: Given The user is logged in.................................................passed When The user clicks on the heart icon for a product........................passed Then The product should be added to the wishlist successfully...............passed And The wishlist should contain the product.................................passed

testcase.classname: User can add products to the compare list to compare between their details
testcase.name: Logged user could add different products to compare list
testcase.system-out: Given The user is logged in.................................................passed And The user searches for something.........................................passed When The user adds a product to the compare list............................passed Then The product should be added to the compare list successfully...........passed When The user adds another product to the compare list......................passed Then The product should be added to the compare list successfully...........passed And The compare list should contain the added products......................passed

testcase.classname: User can create an order and checkout successfully
testcase.name: Create successful Order
testcase.system-out: Given The user is logged in.................................................passed And User has a product in the shopping cart.................................passed When The user accepts the terms of service and goes to the checkout page....passed And Fills in the billing address............................................passed And Selects the shipping method.............................................passed And Selects the payment method..............................................passed And Reviews the payment information.........................................passed And Confirms the order......................................................passed Then The order should be created successfully...............................passed And The orders list should contain the created order........................passed
